body_html:
@bddppq concerning tests: see link to the ROCmSoftwarePlatform#284 where tests for both Caffe2 and PyTorch on ROCm were run as part of creating this PR.

PyTorch doesn't compile on ROCm when the base compiler is gcc is the issue since the original commit. We then switched to LLVM base but now w/ CentOS integration it needed to be fixed.
body_text:
@bddppq concerning tests: see link to the ROCmSoftwarePlatform#284 where tests for both Caffe2 and PyTorch on ROCm were run as part of creating this PR.
PyTorch doesn't compile on ROCm when the base compiler is gcc is the issue since the original commit. We then switched to LLVM base but now w/ CentOS integration it needed to be fixed.
body:
@bddppq concerning tests: see link to the ROCmSoftwarePlatform#284 where tests for both Caffe2 and PyTorch on ROCm were run as part of creating this PR.

PyTorch doesn't compile on ROCm when the base compiler is gcc is the issue since the original commit. We then switched to LLVM base but now w/ CentOS integration it needed to be fixed.
